mapper.select: select count(*) from groupreply where groupreply_boardnum=#{boardNum}

select g.groupreply_num as groupreply_num, g.groupreply_writer as groupreply_writer, g.groupreply_boardnum as groupreply_boardnum, g.groupreply_content as groupreply_content, g.groupreply_createdate as groupreply_createdate, g.groupreply_modifydate as groupreply_modifydate, m.member_nickname as member_nickname from groupreply g inner join member m on m.member_num = g.groupreply_writer where g.groupreply_boardnum=#{groupReplyBoardNum} order by groupreply_createdate desc
